actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, for the purpose of providing that the postage rates for third class mail matter mailed by a qualified county political committee be the postage rates in effect for third-class mail matter mailed by a qualified nonprofit organization.

summary.text: Allows a county committee responsible for the daily operations of a political party to use third-class mail matter rates currently used by nonprofit organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, for the purpose of providing that the postage rates for third class mail matter mailed by a qualified county political committee be the postage rates in effect for third-class mail matter mailed by a qualified nonprofit organization.
